wikipedia_page.main: Michael John Robert Fasham, FRS (29 May 1942 – 7 June 2008) was a British oceanographer and ecosystem modeller.  He is best known for his pioneering work in the development of open ocean plankton ecosystem models.

response: I'm having a spot of bother over at Michael Fasham.  I tried to add a URL to the first cited source there, but the full URL now appears in the references section rather than just hyperlinking the title of the journal source cited.  I think I'm using the template correctly, but can't for the life of me work out why this is happening.  Any ideas?  Cheers, --PLUMBAGO 16:58, 15 September 2010 (UTC)
